guitar

Class Guitar

  • java.lang.Object
    • guitar.Guitar

  • public class Guitar
extends java.lang.Object
    The guitar class is used to create all the objects the guitar requires (and set the default variables). It's also used for the behaviors of the guitar such as plucking a wire, turning the peg to change the wire tension and fretting.
    Author:
    Brandon Andre

    • Field Detail

      • WIRES

        public final int WIRES
        Amount of wires the program needs to generate.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • MIDI_E2

        public static final int MIDI_E2
        Constant value of the sixth wire (E6). Sounds an E2 note which is a midi value of 40.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • MIDI_A2

        public static final int MIDI_A2
        Constant value of the fifth wire (A). Sounds an A2 note which is a midi value of 45.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • MIDI_D3

        public static final int MIDI_D3
        Constant value of the fourth wire (D). Sounds an D3 note which is a midi value of 50.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • MIDI_G3

        public static final int MIDI_G3
        Constant value of the third wire (G). Sounds an G3 note which is a midi value of 55.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • MIDI_B3

        public static final int MIDI_B3
        Constant value of the second wire (B). Sounds an B3 note which is a midi value of 59.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • MIDI_E4

        public static final int MIDI_E4
        Constant value of the first wire (E1). Sounds an E4 note which is a midi value of 64.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Constructor Detail

      • Guitar

        public Guitar()
        Default constructor used to create all the components that the guitar requires.

    • Method Detail

      • pluck

        public void pluck(int wireNum)
        Used to pluck a specific wire on the guitar.
        Parameters:
        wireNum - The specific number of the wire you want to pluck.

      • fret

        public void fret(int wireNum,
                 int fretNum)
        Used to fret a wire at a specific spot on the wire.
        Parameters:
        wireNum - The specific wire you want to fret on.
        fretNum - The position of fret on the specific wire.

      • hammerOn

        public void hammerOn(int wireNum,
                     int fretNum)
        Used to fret and pluck at the same time.
        Parameters:
        wireNum - The specific wire you want to pluck and fret.
        fretNum - The position of fret on the specific wire.

      • turn

        public void turn(int pegNum,
                 int deltaTension)
        Used to change the tension of the wire therefore producing a different sound.
        Parameters:
        pegNum - The specific number that matches with the wire, that turns the pegs.
        deltaTension - Based on it's current position, how much do you want to turn it.
